name: Climax!
about: ican spy James Bond must outsmart card wiz and crime boss Le Chiffre while monitoring his actions.

name: Dr. No
about: sourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

name: From Russia with Love
about: s Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.
actors: Sean Connery, Robert Shaw, Lotte Lenya, Daniela Bianchi

name: Goldfinger
about: e investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

name: Thunderball
about: s Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.
actors: Sean Connery, Claudine Auger, Adolfo Celi, Luciana Paluzzi

name: You Only Live Twice
about: et Agent James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.
actors: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama, Tetsurô Tanba

name: Casino Royale
about: n early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.
director: Val Guest, Ken Hughes, John Huston, Joseph McGrath, Robert Parrish, Richard Talmadge
actors: David Niven, Peter Sellers, Ursula Andress, Orson Welles

name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
about: s Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Ernst Stavro Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps involving beautiful women from around the world.
actors: George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas, Gabriele Ferzetti

name: Diamonds Are Forever
about: amond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.
actors: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray, Lana Wood

name: Live and Let Die
about: s Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.
actors: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour, Clifton James

name: The Man with the Golden Gun
about: s Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.
actors: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland, Maud Adams

name: The Spy Who Loved Me
about: s Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.
actors: Roger Moore, Barbara Bach, Curd Jürgens, Richard Kiel

name: Moonraker
about: s Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.
actors: Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale, Richard Kiel

name: For Your Eyes Only
about: s Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.
actors: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol, Lynn-Holly Johnson

name: Octopussy
about: ke Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.
actors: Roger Moore, Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan, Kristina Wayborn

name: Never Say Never Again
about: P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.
actors: Sean Connery, Kim Basinger, Klaus Maria Brandauer, Max von Sydow

name: A View to a Kill
about: recovery of a microchip off the body of a fellow agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.
actors: Roger Moore, Christopher Walken, Tanya Roberts, Grace Jones

name: The Living Daylights
about: s Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy to kill all enemy spies and uncovers an arms deal that potentially has major global ramifications.
actors: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen Krabbé, Joe Don Baker

name: Licence to Kill
about: r capturing a drug lord, Felix Leiter is left for dead and his wife is murdered. James Bond goes rogue and seeks vengeance on those responsible, as he infiltrates an organisation posing as a hitman.
actors: Timothy Dalton, Robert Davi, Carey Lowell, Talisa Soto

name: GoldenEye
about: s after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.
actors: Pierce Brosnan, Sean Bean, Izabella Scorupco, Famke Janssen

name: Tomorrow Never Dies
about: s Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.
actors: Pierce Brosnan, Jonathan Pryce, Michelle Yeoh, Teri Hatcher

name: The World Is Not Enough
about: s Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.
actors: Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards

name: Die Another Day
about: s Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.
actors: Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Rosamund Pike, Toby Stephens

name: Casino Royale
about: r earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.
actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench, Jeffrey Wright

name: Quantum of Solace
about: s Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.
actors: Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric, Judi Dench

name: Skyfall
about: s Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.
actors: Daniel Craig, Javier Bardem, Naomie Harris, Judi Dench

name: Spectre
about: yptic message from James Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover the existence of a sinister organisation named SPECTRE. With a new threat dawning, Bond learns the terrible truth about the author of all his pain in his most recent missions.
actors: Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Léa Seydoux, Ralph Fiennes
